title: The Sun, Sex, Blood and Time
description: The Sun, Sex, Blood and Time is an opportunity to dive on the roads of Alicia, the protagonist of the book. A novel full of nostalgia, nice narrative and sarcasm. The way he describes the harsh life of a prostitute, as narrated so poetic, removes much of the hardness of the profession and can even be attractive to the eye of the reader.Gradually, our history is intertwined with fantasy, until finally, it is not known to be true and that is the result of substance abuse. At this time, the author includes an unexpected character, the protagonist transforms into a completely different type of "person".Colliard exploits the wild side of life, leads us to the hells in which everything can be fixed with sex and drugs, leads us into Alicia's skin and makes us partakers of its miseries. Among these pages, there is a whole world unknown to many, a rare life where we discover strange characters and new experiences.
author: Alejandro Colliard
